programme.title: Christmas Carol
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, a teen's body is found. His vengeful twin enters juvie to find the truth, hunting suspects.

programme.title: One-Line
programme.desc: A young hustler joins a group of professional con artists to begin a career in loan brokerage. The field is dangerous, especially when you can't trust the other players.

programme.title: Closed School
programme.desc: After a crash, Yura and friends wake up at their closed school, terrified and unsure why they're there.

programme.title: Mission Possible
programme.desc: To a private investigator Woo Su-han, who will take on any job if it pays the bill, a secret agent Yoo Da-hee comes along with $10,000 in cash. She proposes a joint operation to investigate an arms trafficking case. They attract more attention when they’re together and as the scope of this case increases by the minute, they leave behind evidence that put them on police’s target list...

programme.title: Someone You Loved
programme.desc: Jun-ho and A-yeong are a couple living together. One day, She feels he is wasting his life with the excuse of an exam.

programme.title: The Girl on A Bulldozer
programme.desc: A single father gets into a mysterious car accident, leaving Hye-yeong and her young brother all alone.

programme.title: The Roundup
programme.desc: Monster Cop Ma tracks drug dealers via app, exposing a brutal Korea-PH gambling ring and dark crimes.

programme.title: She's On Duty
programme.desc: For catching a gangster, a cop, Jae-in, poses as a high school girl to get close to the gangster's daughter.

programme.title: Ashfall
programme.desc: A mission begins to stop a super volcanic eruption threatening to engulf both North and South Korea.

programme.title: Moonlit Winter
programme.desc: Sae-bom finds a mysterious love letter sent to her mom, Yun-hee. This letter makes her wonder about Yun-hee.

programme.title: The Groin
programme.desc: During the Joseon times, three people who don't believe in love make a bet. Corrupted affection stories begin!

programme.title: Monster
programme.desc: Bok-Soon tries to take revenge on her sister’s killer, Tae-Soo, while he also tries to silence her for good.
